summary: Email correspondence between law enforcement officials regarding an investigation into an individual's recent travels with Jeffrey Epstein. The email requests a summary of flights over the past six months and discusses phone records and subscriber information associated with email accounts.

persons.name: N. (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: Recipient of an email discussing an investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein, specifically regarding an individual's travels and phone records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to an individual's recent travels, indicating he is a central figure in the law enforcement inquiry.

connections.description: The FBI agent is investigating matters related to Jeffrey Epstein, specifically the travels of an associate.

events.title: Investigation into Epstein Associate's Travels
events.description: Law enforcement officials are investigating an individual's recent travels with Jeffrey Epstein over the past six months, requesting flight summaries and examining associated phone records.

keyFacts: Law enforcement is actively investigating an individual's travels with Jeffrey Epstein as of July 2019.
The investigation involves reviewing flight records from the past six months and analyzing phone records linked to email accounts.
The correspondence indicates coordination between the NYPD and FBI on a Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
An individual's cell phone number is considered relevant to the investigation into travels with Epstein.
